title: The Full Report
description: Complete the mission report with all your editing skills.
objective: Fix all errors using insert, delete char, and delete word.
quote:
You've learned the basics.
Now apply them all together.

A true operator adapts,
choosing the right tool for each task.
victory_quote:
Mission report filed successfully.
Command is impressed with your efficiency.

You've proven yourself a capable editor.
But the real test is yet to come...
lore:
The final mission report must be filed.
It's a mess of errorsâ€”some need insertion,
others deletion, some whole words removed.

Use everything you've learned:
- 'i' for missing characters
- 'x' for extra characters
- 'dw' for unnecessary words

This is your comprehensive test.
